title: AI user code of conduct attestation
description: Attest that the issuer is committed to follow a particular code of conduct with respect to their personal use of AI.

i.description: Identifier of the issuer (the one giving the award)

dt.description: Time at which the award becomes public. This may be before or after the time of issuance.

coc.description: The code of conduct to which the issuer commits. SHOULD hold the SAID of a document published elsewhere, OR HTML encoded as a data URL. MAY also contain an ordinary URL. In the latter case, the issuer is asserting a commitment to whatever is published at that location, but not to specific content (since the content can change after the issuance date). This may or may not justify the trust of the verifier.
